name: Track Layer
description: The train is off course, out of control, and running off it's track! In Track Layer it's up to you to place tracks that will guide the train around obstacles avoid danger until it arrives safely at a station. This train will find itself traveling through lush country side, tropical islands, and volcanic lands. Watch out! It's not just stationary objects you have to avoid, dangerous beavers lurk around just looking for a chance to derail your train!
